Module count

Package count.matek

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DiscreteDistribution
    Common interface for working with probabilistic distributions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiscreteGamma
    Ziheng Yang's discrete gamma approximation for rates-across-sites variation
    FunctionMinimization
    This class implements a number of numerical optimization methods for function minimization and root finding in one or multiple dimensions.
    Functions
    Some functions adapted from Numerical Recipes, and other useful calculations.
    Functions.RisingFactorial
    Class for generalized rising factorials.
    Logarithms
    Arithmetics on log-scale.
    NegativeBinomial
    Negative binomial (Pólya) distribution.
    PointDistribution
    Point (Bernoulli) distribution: p(0)=p; p(1)=1-p.
    Poisson
    Poisson distribution.
    PrecisionTest
    Numerical tests used during code development: how to compute ln(1-exp(-x))?
    PseudoRandom
    Pseudorandom number generation with various distributions.
    ShiftedGeometric
    Shifted geometric distribution.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FunctionMinimization.OptimizationException
    Exception thrown when too many iteration in one of the routines.
